scripts.all: rm -rf @out && npm run chapters && npm run books && npm run github
scripts.chapters: rm -rf @out/html @out/pdf && node bin/html.js && node bin/highlight.js && node bin/pdfify.js
scripts.github: rm -rf readme.md && npm run html:h && node bin/github.js
scripts.epub: npm run mdx && rm -rf @out/tsmin.epub && pandoc -S -o @out/@name.epub book.txt @out/mdx/**/*.md --highlight-style haddock --epub-cover-image=cover.png --epub-stylesheet=book.epub.css --toc-depth=5
scripts.pdf: rm -rf @out/@name.pdf && npm run mdx && pandoc -N --template=template.tex --variable mainfont="Palatino" --variable sansfont="Century Gothic" --variable monofont="Consolas" --variable fontsize=12pt --variable version='1.0.0' book.txt @out/mdx/**/*.md --latex-engine=xelatex --toc --toc-depth=5 -o @out/@name.pdf
scripts.html:hp: rm -rf @out/@name-pan.html &&  npm run mdx && pandoc book.txt @out/mdx/**/*.md -s -t html -o @out/@name-pan.html --toc  --toc-depth=5 --template="template.html" --section-divs
scripts.html:h: rm -rf @out/@name.html && mkdir -p @out && pandoc book.txt @input/**/*.md -s -o @out/@name.html --toc --toc-depth=5 --template="template.html" --section-divs && node bin/hjs.js
scripts.books: npm run clean:books && npm run html:hp && npm run html:h && npm run pdf && npm run md && npm run epub && npm run mobi
